name: Makeover Connect
description:
Makeover Connect is the best combination of home design and pair matching puzzle game! If you are the super fan of home design or pair matching puzzle game, you will never miss this game! Match puzzle and decorate your dreamy home! Makeover Connect will bring you the double happiness and the best game experience!

Match the pairs of the same images and get more rewards! There are also many rooms for you to design! Are you a good interior designer? Thousands of fashion furniture are waiting for you choose! From the outside of the house to the interior, living room to bathroom, every furniture is needed to be chose by yourself!

Features
- The endless levels make you never bored!
- Exercise your brain and improve your reaction speed!
- It's the only game which can bring you the double happiness and unique game experience!
- All kinds of furniture and a variety of decoration styles are available for you to select!
- Generous rewards and interesting events are waiting for you!

Download Makeover Connect now and be the best matching puzzle master& home designer!
